name: Punch Bowl Cake
instructions: In large punch bowl, cube 2 of the pound cake. Mix 1 package pudding with 1 1/2 cup milk. Then pour over cake cubes. Slice 3 bananas and add to top. Then add 1 can crushed pineapple and top with 1 can of cherry pie filling. Repeat layers and top with 1 large Cool Whip. Can be decorated with maraschino cherries and nuts. Refrigerate well before serving.
